titleStmt.title: A True narrative of the proceedings at the session-house in the Old-Bayly, begun the 28 of August, and ended the 31, 1678 containing the tryals of several for murder, and also, of the high-way-men that robbed the lace-man, one for a rape, and all other malefactors for any considerable crimes, that were there arraigned, the tryal of the female muggleton, which was at the last sessions : with the number of those that are condemn'd, burn'd in the hand, transported, and to be whipt.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
